title: Twenty-Four Days
location: Lira and Kaito's ship in deep space
revealed_to_reader: Day 1: Threadkeepers detect transmission, alter course
Day 3: Threadkeepers demand cease transmission, Lira refuses until evidence
Day 5: Threadkeeper ships approaching via FTL jumps
Day 6: Threadkeepers board, show Harvester probe - LIRA VERIFIES AS REAL
Day 8: Complete evidence package transmitted to human space
Day 12: Threadkeeper warning - destroy ansible or cease voluntarily
Day 15: HARVESTERS DETECTED approaching Lira's position
Day 16: Lira shuts down ansible, Harvesters alter course away
Day 18: Harvesters leave - confirmed automated extinction machines
Day 20: Lira and Kaito choose to continue to Threadkeeper coordinates
Day 24: Threadkeeper escort begins, 30 years remaining to destination
chapter_purpose: Show Lira/Kaito verification process, confirm Harvester existence, demonstrate Threadkeeper honesty, establish they survived but committed to decades more travel
